item.title: [HELP]Unlimited hp command against monsters and others[PI]
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

You should STOP working on your private server right now, go read a book in java, then come back to your private server.

I’m not saying that to sound like an asshole who says you suck at java, (because I do to), rather than saying it because you’re not going to learn proper java through RSPS’s. So if in a couple of months you want to create a program that’s not a RSPS in java, you won’t be able to because you only know how to edit private servers.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]Unlimited hp command against monsters and others[PI]
item.dc:creator: @galade57465746 galade57465746
item.description:
@galade57465746 wrote:

Hey guys,
I need a code that makes everyone on the server have unlimited hp against monsters ONLY so players can also pk without having infinite hp and when you eat food it doesn’t reset you hp. Can any1 help me? I’ve got the code

if (playerCommand.equals("maxhp") && (c.playerRights == 3)) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client p = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; p.playerLevel[3] = 99999999; } } }
It’s just some crappy coding since I’m a begginer in Java

Also what would be the method(or whatever) that would NOT make you loose items when you die from monsters?

IK this would make a server crap but fun!
Thanks

Read full topic
